entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
